distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for giflib fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2015-7555: Heap overflow in giffix (bsc#960319)
- bsc#949160: Fix a memory leak
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Heap-based buffer overflow in giffix.c in giffix in giflib 5.1.1 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (program crash) via crafted image and logical screen width fields in a GIF file.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

fixed: SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 12 SP1:libgif6-32bit-5.0.5-7.1.x86_64
